Katherine Broner

full stack web developer and art enthusiast

About Me

As a native San Franciscan turned New Yorker, I love to create meaningful and inspiring web applications.

I am a full stack developer that enjoys working in Ruby on Rails and JavaScript, with a passion for continuously learning new languages. Strong communication and a collaborative environment is where I thrive. The exciting changes being made in the tech industry keep me motivated on a daily basis.

In addition to coding, I love to visit musuems, practice yoga, and explore different parks in New York City.

Projects

Museum Finder

A Rails web app that allows users to easily find New York City museums by category, location, or name

source code

LES Film Festival

A Rails faux film festival website that allows users to write posts and comments about films

source code

Samplify

A Rails website built at the Monthly Music Hackathon that uses the Spotify API to help users discover new music.

source code
